text: SciTechDaily - The treatment uses a type of CRISPR to target viral RNA and appears to stop replication of both viruses in the lungs. @SciTechDaily1 #COVID19 #mRNA #Flu #DARPA #Genetics #CRISPR #RNA #Cas13a #InfectiousDiseases #Influenza #Vaccine #Virology https://t.co/8vEpO4HvbY https://t.co/FT20ZxULFb
